data.md:MetaData: Lithology of sediment core CAMILLA2, Camillan Wood, Ireland

Terrestrial soil mor humus. Physiography: basin. Surrounding vegetation: Blechno-Quercetum association. Local vegetation: Quercus pet, Ilex aqu., Taxus, Salix, Betula. Location: central part of the wood. Device: Russian corer (4 cm)
The vegetational history of the Killarney oak woods southwest Ireland: evidence from fine spatial resolution pollen analysis
